glyph_destruction.name: Glyph of Destruction
glyph_destruction.description: Gain 1 mana of destruction for this turn

glyph_arcane.name: Glyph of Arcane
glyph_arcane.description: Gain 1 mana of arcane for this turn

glyph_order.name: Glyph of Order
glyph_order.description: Gain 1 mana of order for this turn

glyph_chaos.name: Glyph of Chaos
glyph_chaos.description: Gain 1 mana of chaos for this turn

glyph_creation.name: Glyph of Creation
glyph_creation.description: Gain 1 mana of any type for this turn

catalsyt.name: Catalyst
catalsyt.description: When the card is played combine it with 1 regular magic glyph or 2 creation glyphs to infuse it, otherwise you will need 2 regular glyphs of the same type. At the end of your turn gives you 1 mana of the type of the infusing glyph(s)

generator.name: Generator
generator.description: Doubles the mana given to you by the block above
generator.warning: This block can only be the first block in your tower

arcane_mirror.name: Arcane Mirror
arcane_mirror.description: Choose an opponent, until the end of the game this block will copy the function of the block at the same level in the opponent's tower
arcane_mirror.warning: Does not copy the bonus effects applied to the block. Cannot copy an Observatory.

observatory.name: Observatory
observatory.description: From your next turn, all the spells you play will start at level 2. The first level of the spells is no longer available to you
observatory.warning: You cannot place any other block on top of this one

ignite.name: Ignite
ignite.level_1: Choose a card in your opponent's hand and discard it
ignite.level_2: Choose a card from your hand and 2 cards from your opponent's hand and discard them
ignite.level_3: Look at your opponent's hand then choose one of his cards to discard

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.level_1: At the end of your turn discard your whole hand, gain a mana of destruction for every 2 discarded cards
sacrifice.level_2: Same as the previous level but you choose a regular type of mana to be generated instead of destruction
sacrifice.level_3: Discard any number of cards from your hand, gain 1 mana of destruction for every discarded card

amplify.name: Amplify
amplify.level_1: Double the number of cards drawn or discarded from your next spell
amplify.level_2: The next 2 spells you play this turn start at level 2
amplify.level_3: At the end of your turn, gain the double amount of mana from every source

clearsight.name: Clearsight
clearsight.level_1: Draw a card from the bench
clearsight.level_2: Draw 2 cards from the bench, then look at the cards in the street whithout revealing them
clearsight.level_3: Look at the cards in the street whithout revealing them, then draw 3 cards from the bench or the deck

benevolence.name: Benevolence
benevolence.level_1: Take a card of your choice from one of your opponent's hand
benevolence.level_2: Steal up to 3 regular manas from one of your opponents
benevolence.level_3: Start a new turn after your first one ends. Your blocks will not give you any mana at the end of it

equality.name: Equality
equality.level_1: Draw until you have as many cards as one of your opponents
equality.level_2: Choose if all the players draw 2 from the deck, or discard 3 cards from their hand
equality.level_3: Reduce all mana points accumulated by all players to 0

mind_control.name: Mind Control
mind_control.level_1: Interchange the street and the market, mix the new street then draw a card from the bench
mind_control.level_2: Shuffle the bench into the deck, distribute a new bench, draw 3 cards from it and your turn ends
mind_control.level_3: At the end of your turn, exchange your hand with any of your opponents

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.level_1: Shuffle your hand into the deck, draw as many cards as you had
confusion.level_2: Same as the previous level but for an opponent
confusion.level_3: The effects of the previous levels are combined. All your opponents are targeted, but you can choose the number of cards to shuffle and draw

apotheosis.name: Apotheosis
apotheosis.level_3: Destroy a block from the Tower of one of your opponents

spellcatcher.name: Spellcatcher
spellcatcher.description: Whenever a spell or a spellcatcher is played, you can use this card to counter it. If in the end a spell is countered, it is discarded and the mana used to play it is lost
spellcatcher.warning: You cannot play this card during an incantation

renovation.name: Renovation
renovation.option_1: Reconfigure your tower using the already played blocks
renovation.option_2: Insert a block from your hand into your tower
renovation.option_3: Destroy a block from your tower and draw a card from the bench
renovation.warning: The placement restrictions of your blocks must be respected
